4.message:
Greetings Guardians,

As some of you may have noticed, there are quite a few things brewing here at Fincon in regards to Hello Hero.  We do not like keeping our Guardians in the dark, so we are taking the time to give everyone a little update on what is coming in the next few days.

We are currently waiting on Appleâ€™s review of all the new updates and contents to be approved.  This can take anywhere from 1 to 10 days.  Once it has been approved, you can expect the following updates and content:
- Text issue for Androids and IOS will be fixed!
- New Boss Raid: Mama Chicken will arrive!
- Other minor updates and fixes

In the meantime, you can enjoy our usual Weekday and Weekend events!

During the Event Period (4/29 00:00 ~ 23:59 EST) enjoy:
-4/29: random Stamina and Energy box drops in all missions!

We thank our Guardians for their continued patience and love for Hello Hero!  It has been a long journey and we are glad to have shared it with you!

Happy Gaming!

8.message:
Greetings Guardians!

As some of you may have noticed, there's a mysterious Treasure Hunt boost of 2.0x EXP and Items floating around Hello Hero. 

Well it looks like our 'Weekday Event' was let out the box a day early! 

For now, enjoy the 2.0x Hero drop and EXP Boosts in the Treasure Hunts and be sure to tune in tomorrow (4/28) for Part 2 of our 'Weekday Event'!!!

~ Fincon J

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Greetings Guardians!

Flowers are blooming, trees are filling with leaves, and the weather is warming.  All of us here at Fincon are preparing for exciting new things to pop up in Hello Hero!  In celebration of this, weâ€™re bringing back to popular Pop Up Event!

During the POP UP Event Period (4/27 00:00 ~ 23:59 EST), enjoy an Increased 3x Gold Drop Rate:
- 1st Round: 00:00 ~ 02:00 (EST)
- 2nd Round: 06:00 ~ 08:00 (EST)
- 3rd Round: 12:00 ~ 14:00 (EST)
- 4th Round: 18:00 ~ 20:00 (EST)

As with our previous Pop Up Event, this event will occur Four separate times throughout the 24-hour period, with the first beginning @ 00:00 ~ 02:00 (EST).  An in-game notice will pop up indicating when the next period will begin!  Daily Login gifts will still occur at the normal interval and times!

Take full advantage and blossom your team into the strongest possible!  The time to get rich is now!

Happy Gaming!

Greetings Guardians,

To prepare for the new month ahead, our Guardians must take time to hone their skills as individuals and as a team.  For this very reason, we are calling all Guardians to head over to the Arena for a very special Server Wars Fight Week!  

Introducing the Fists of Fury Fight Week!

During the Event Period (4/25 ~ 4/30 23:59 EST), participate in the Arena:
- At least 10 times to receive a Random Master (3â˜…) Hero 
- At least 50 times to receive 100,000 gold
- At least 100 times to receive a Random Epic (4â˜…) Hero
- At least 150 times to receive a Random Item Box (Unique 5â˜… ~ Legendary 6â˜…)
- At least 200 times to receive a Random Unique (5â˜…) Hero 
- At least 300 times to receive 900,000 gold

But wait, thereâ€™s more!  This weekâ€™s Fight Week is all about team work!  Not only will there be individual rewards for Fight Week, but weâ€™re bringing back the Server Wars as well!

The Top Servers will all receive more rewards and boosts. Rankings will be calculated by combining the total scores of all participants in each server.

-Buff Period: 2015.05.04 ~2015.05.07 23:59EST
- 1st Place Server: 2.0x Increased Gold Drop Rate, 1.5x Hero EXP Boost, 2.0x Increased Hero Drop Rate
- 2nd Place Server: 2.0x Increased Gold Drop Rate and 2.0x Increased Hero Drop Rate
- 3rd Place Server: 1.5x Increased Gold Drop Rate, and 2.0x Increased Hero Drop Rate
- 4th ~ 6th Place Servers: 1.5x Increased Gold Drop Rate

This is your chance to make your contribution count!  Fight for yourself, your server, and all of Armon now fellow Guardians!

If youâ€™re ready to show who the top server is, â€˜Likeâ€™ and â€˜Shareâ€™ NOW!

Happy Gaming!
